title: At last, signs of life
text: After what seems like a life time of walking I have come across a building, there's no ship nearby and no landing pad. Considering I've seen no real signs of life (other han this) I assume it'll be empty.
There's some kind of large antenna on the buliding, so hopefully I'll be able to contact someone if.
At worse it'll be a good place to stay the night before I carry on my search for materials.
